title: PRP Facelift
description: Natural skin rejuvenation using your own platelet-rich plasma to stimulate collagen and restore youthful radiance
longDescription: The PRP Facelift is a revolutionary regenerative treatment that uses your body's own healing factors to rejuvenate skin from within. By extracting, concentrating, and reinjecting your platelet-rich plasma (PRP), we trigger natural collagen production, improve skin texture, and restore a youthful glow—all without surgery or synthetic substances.

seo.metaDescription: Natural PRP Facelift in London. Boost collagen, improve texture & restore radiance using your own blood platelets. From £450. Book consultation.
seo.h1: PRP Facelift London | Natural Regenerative Facial Treatment

hero.headline: Nature's Most Powerful Anti-Aging Secret
hero.subheadline: Regenerate, rejuvenate, and glow from within using your body's own healing power

overview.title: What is a PRP Facelift?
overview.content:
A PRP Facelift uses your own blood's healing properties to rejuvenate your skin naturally. We draw a small amount of blood (similar to a routine blood test), separate the platelet-rich plasma using centrifugation, and inject this concentrated 'liquid gold' back into your face.

PRP contains powerful growth factors that stimulate collagen production, improve skin texture and tone, reduce fine lines, and promote overall skin health. Unlike synthetic fillers, PRP works by activating your body's natural regenerative processes for gradual, long-lasting improvements.
highlights: Improves skin texture, tone, and radiance
Safe with virtually no risk of allergic reaction
Can be combined with microneedling or fillers

howItWorks.title: The Science Behind PRP
howItWorks.subtitle: Understanding the regenerative power of platelets
howItWorks.content:
Platelets are tiny cells in your blood that contain growth factors essential for healing and tissue regeneration. When you cut yourself, platelets rush to the injury and release these growth factors to repair tissue. 

By concentrating platelets and injecting them into facial skin, we trigger this same healing response—stimulating collagen production, increasing blood flow, and activating stem cells. The result is naturally younger-looking, healthier skin.

process.title: Your PRP Facelift Journey
process.subtitle: What to expect during your natural rejuvenation treatment

steps.title: Consultation & Assessment
steps.description: Comprehensive skin evaluation, discussion of your concerns and goals, medical history review, and customized treatment planning.

steps.title: Blood Collection
steps.description: We draw a small amount of blood (10-20ml) from your arm, similar to a routine blood test. Quick and virtually painless.

steps.title: PRP Preparation
steps.description: Your blood is placed in a centrifuge which spins it to separate and concentrate the platelet-rich plasma. Meanwhile, numbing cream is applied to your face.
tips: The magic happens in the centrifuge

steps.title: PRP Injection
steps.description: The concentrated PRP is strategically injected into target areas using fine needles or cannula. We focus on areas needing rejuvenation.

steps.title: Optional Microneedling
steps.description: Many patients add microneedling to enhance PRP absorption and results. The PRP is applied topically after microneedling creates micro-channels.

steps.title: Post-Treatment Care
steps.description: Detailed aftercare instructions provided. Expect mild redness and possible swelling for 24-48 hours, similar to a sunburn.

steps.title: Results Development
steps.description: Results appear gradually as collagen production increases. Initial glow within 1 week, continued improvement over 3-6 months.

faq.question: Does PRP Facelift hurt?
faq.answer: Most patients find PRP comfortable with topical numbing cream. Blood draw is like a standard blood test. The injections feel like tiny pinpricks—tolerable for most. The entire procedure is less uncomfortable than most expect. We prioritize your comfort throughout.

faq.question: How long until I see results?
faq.answer: You'll notice an initial glow within 1-2 weeks as growth factors activate. However, PRP works gradually by stimulating collagen production. Visible improvements appear around 4-6 weeks, with optimal results at 3-6 months. Patience pays off—natural regeneration takes time!

faq.question: How long do PRP results last?
faq.answer: Results can last 12-18 months, sometimes longer. Unlike fillers that dissolve, PRP stimulates your own collagen which persists. Many patients do annual maintenance treatments to sustain results. The improvements continue developing for months after treatment.

faq.question: How many treatments do I need?
faq.answer: We typically recommend 3 treatments spaced 4-6 weeks apart for optimal results, followed by annual maintenance. Younger patients (late 20s-30s) may need fewer sessions, while mature skin or severe concerns may benefit from additional treatments. Customized during consultation.

faq.question: What's the downtime?
faq.answer: Minimal. Expect redness and possible mild swelling for 24-48 hours, similar to a sunburn. Small bruises at injection sites are possible. Most patients return to work the next day. Avoid makeup for 24 hours and strenuous exercise for 48 hours.

faq.question: Is PRP safe?
faq.answer: Extremely safe. Since we use your own blood, there's virtually no risk of allergic reaction or disease transmission. Risks are minimal—primarily bruising or infection (very rare with sterile technique). PRP has been used in medicine for decades with excellent safety records.

faq.question: Can I combine PRP with other treatments?
faq.answer: Yes! PRP works beautifully with microneedling (highly recommended), dermal fillers, and anti-wrinkle injections. Many patients do PRP for overall skin quality and add fillers for volume. The combinations are synergistic, each enhancing the other's results.

faq.question: What's the difference between PRP Facelift and Vampire Facial?
faq.answer: They're similar. 'Vampire Facial' typically refers to PRP combined with microneedling, popularized by celebrities. 'PRP Facelift' usually involves injection only. We offer both approaches and will recommend what's best for your specific concerns and skin type.

faq.question: Am I too young/old for PRP?
faq.answer: PRP works for a wide age range. Younger patients (late 20s-30s) use it preventatively and for skin quality. Patients 40+ use it for rejuvenation and anti-aging. It's effective from late 20s through 60s+. Suitability determined during consultation based on your specific concerns.

faq.question: What should I avoid before PRP treatment?
faq.answer: For 1 week before: avoid blood-thinning supplements (fish oil, vitamin E, aspirin, ibuprofen) to minimize bruising. Continue prescription medications. Avoid alcohol 24 hours before. Arrive well-hydrated and having eaten. Stop retinoids 3 days before if combining with microneedling.

faq.question: Can men have PRP treatments?
faq.answer: Absolutely! PRP is increasingly popular with men seeking natural skin improvement. It's particularly effective for acne scarring, large pores, rough texture, and overall skin health. No one will know you've had treatment—you'll just look healthier and more refreshed.

candidacy.title: Is PRP Right for You?
candidacy.subtitle: PRP Facelift may be ideal if:
suitable: You want natural, gradual skin rejuvenation
You have dull, tired-looking skin lacking radiance
You have fine lines, wrinkles, or rough texture
You have acne scarring or sun damage
You prefer treatments without synthetic substances
You're willing to commit to a treatment series
You have realistic expectations about gradual results
notSuitable: Skin cancer or active cancer treatment
candidacy.note: Medical suitability assessed during consultation. Most healthy adults are excellent candidates.

safety.title: Proven Safety, Natural Results
safety.content: PRP therapy has been used in medicine for over 30 years in orthopedics, dentistry, and wound healing. Its application in aesthetic medicine is backed by extensive research demonstrating safety and efficacy.

certifications.name: Autologous Treatment
certifications.description: Uses your own blood—no foreign substances

testimonials.name: Rebecca H.
testimonials.text: After 3 sessions, my skin looks incredible! The texture is so smooth, my pores are smaller, and I have this natural glow I haven't had in years. People keep asking what I'm doing differently. Worth every penny!

testimonials.name: David M.
testimonials.text: I've struggled with acne scarring for years. After my PRP series, the scars have significantly improved and my overall skin quality is so much better. Dr. Abbas explained everything thoroughly and the results exceeded expectations.

testimonials.name: Amanda K.
testimonials.text: I wanted something natural that would actually work. PRP delivered! My skin is firmer, brighter, and lines have softened. It took patience—about 3 months to see full results—but completely worth the wait.
